author: lem888
content:
Hi Guys! I need some help for research purposes. I hope someone could help me out! So specifically I am looking for information on slashings/whistleblowing in Ethereum 2.0 network. Ideally, the data I am looking for is to let me know whether any whistleblowing messages were censored (at least temporarily) so that they failed to impose a deserved slashing. I am wondering if (1) such data exists, (2) if there is some kind of API tool that I could use to get it?

I'd really appreciate any help!

author: potuz
content: Sounds like a very cool project. I guess the very first thing you can do is check all slashings for the inclusion slot. If it was right after the offending attestation/proposal you'll know they weren't censored
